title: Human mesenchymal stem cells efficiently manage oxidative stress
publication_info: A Valle-Prieto, PA Conget - Stem cells and development, 2010 - liebertpub.com
snippet:
The transplantation of mesenchymal stem cells (MSCs) proves to be useful to treat pathologies 
in which tissue damage is linked to oxidative stress (OS). The aim of our work was to evaluate 
whether primary human MSCs (hMSCs) can manage OS. For this, in vitro we assessed …

title: The immunomodulatory properties of mesenchymal stem cells
publication_info: I Marigo, F Dazzi - Seminars in immunopathology, 2011 - Springer
snippet:
